verbose_text: Silencing CD109 also reduced the total levels of YAP (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY), which was modest compared to the reduction of S127 phosphorylation, suggesting that CD109 can regulate YAP / TAZ independently of the Hippo signaling pathway (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
evidence:
CD109 also
reduced the total levels of YAP ( XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY ), which was modest compared
to the reduction of S127 phosphorylation, suggesting that CD109 can regulate YAP/TAZ
